panels.description: Basic CPU info (this chart does not work with more than 1 host variant)

targets.expr: sum by(host) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host=~"$validator", mode="system", network="$network"}[5m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (host)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host=~"$validator", network="$network"}[5m])))

sum by(host) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host=~"$validator", mode="user", network="$network"}[5m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (host)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host=~"$validator", network="$network"}[5m])))

sum by(host) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host=~"$validator",mode="iowait", network="$network"}[5m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (host)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host=~"$validator", network="$network"}[5m])))

sum by(host) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host=~"$validator", mode=~".*irq", network="$network"}[5m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (host)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host=~"$validator", network="$network"}[5m])))

sum by(host) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host=~"$validator", mode!='idle',mode!='user',mode!='system',mode!='iowait',mode!='irq',mode!='softirq', network="$network"}[5m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (host)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host=~"$host", network="$network"}[5m])))

sum by(host) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host=~"$validator", mode="idle", network="$network"}[5m])) / on(host) group_left sum by (host)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{host=~"$validator", network="$network"}[5m])))

panels.title: CPU Usage (percentage)

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

targets.expr: sum by (host) (node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{host=~"$validator", network="$network"} - node_memory_MemFree_bytes{host=~"$validator", network="$network"} - (node_memory_Cached_bytes{host=~"$validator", network="$network"} + node_memory_Buffers_bytes{host=~"$validator", network="$network"} + node_memory_SReclaimable_bytes{host=~"$validator", network="$network"}))

panels.description: Disk space used of all filesystems mounted
panels.title: Disk used

targets.expr: sum by (statefulset_kubernetes_io_pod_name) (rate(total_transaction_certificates{app=~".*validator.*", network="$network"}[5m])) - sum by (statefulset_kubernetes_io_pod_name) (rate(num_shared_obj_tx{app=~".*validator.*", network="$network"}[5m]))

sum by (statefulset_kubernetes_io_pod_name) (rate(total_transaction_certificates{job=~".*suival.*", network="$network"}[5m])) - sum by (statefulset_kubernetes_io_pod_name) (rate(num_shared_obj_tx{job=~".*suival.*", network="$network"}[5m]))
sum by (host) (rate(total_transaction_certificates{host!="", network="$network"}[5m])) - sum by (host) (rate(num_shared_obj_tx{host!="", network="$network"}[5m]))

panels.title: Finalized Tx QPS - Single Writer Transaction
Execution Driver - executed transactions per sec

panels.description: The number of certificates that are pending for sequencing in an authority. A high number of inflight certificates shows a pathogen in the system as an authority is waiting for a certificate to get sequenced and it does not in time.
panels.title: Pending certificates to sequence
